question: Is creatinine assessment included in the MELD score?
ideal_answer: Yes, creatinine is included in the Model For End-Stage Liver Disease (MELD) score. Other components of the MELD score are international normalized ratio and serum billirubin. The MELD score is used for evaluation of liver cirrhosis.
